alert.note: Alert for Dooly (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:53PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Turkey Creek at Byromville affecting Dooly County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Turkey Creek at Byromville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Minor flooding expands into the woodland areas upstream and downstream from the stream gage on Georgia Highway 90. Larger portions of creek access roads will flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 11.3 feet and steady. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
